name: 李曉祺　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程提供學生親自動手的智能系統設計與實踐規劃。課程由兩個主要部分構成，包括講座及實作實踐課程。
課程共計 18 周將分為以下三個階段: 
第一階段為大師班系列，由臺北科技大學及麻省理工學院的教授和相關行業的專家擔任主講人。
第二階段將著重於基礎製造知識，如 CAD、電腦數值控制、3D 列印、雷射切割、PCB 設計與實做、傳感器與致動器、嵌入式處理器、有線和無線通信。
第三階段將結合前階段所習技能致力於原型設計。強調學習如何使用這些工具及其工作原理。
課程最後將以期末發表會展示學習成果。
The course provides a hands-on introduction to the resources for designing and fabricating smart systems. The course consists of two major portions, including lecture and hands-on lab session. The course will be divided into the following three stages. The course will finish with a final presentation and demo session as final exam.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-3: Masterclass Lectures
Week 4: Wireless Communication
Week 5: Information Security
Week 6-7: Work Sessions
Week 8: Term Project Proposal
Week 9: Design Tools, GitHub
Week 10: 3D Printing
Week 11: Laser Cutter, Water Cutter, Semi-auto Devices
Week 12: Microcontroller
Week 13: PCB Design
Week 14: Sensor and Actuator: control and operations
Week 15-17: Prototyping
Week 18: Final Presentation (Demo)
scorePolicy:
Project proposal 10%
Final Demonstration 50%
Attendance 10%
Class Participation 30%
materials:
[1] How to Make (Almost) Anything. (https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/media-arts-and-sciences/mas-863-how-to-m ake-almost-anything-fall-2002/syllabus/)
[2] MAS.863. (2019) (http://fab.cba.mit.edu/classes/863.19/) ; (2020) (https://fab.cba.mit.edu/classes/863.20/)
[3] Final Project. (http://academy.cba.mit.edu/classes/project_development/index.html)
remarks:
Email: hcli@mail.ntut.edu.tw

Or contact Dr. 林家樑 mcllin@mit.edu
